subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Perhaps with an asterisk, Tommy Haas, who lost his opener Monday, was the most credentialed American in the men’s field at this U.S. Open, despite being ranked 506th.
snippet: Perhaps with an asterisk, Tommy Haas, who lost his opener Monday, was the most credentialed American in the men’s field at this U.S. Open, despite being ranked 506th.
